description: All of Minoris’s recommended PostCSS plugins in one easy-to-use preset.
readme:
# postcss-minoris

[![NPM version][npm-image]][npm-url]
[![Circle CI](https://circleci.com/gh/minoris-io/postcss-minoris.svg?style=shield)](https://circleci.com/gh/minoris-io/postcss-minoris)

All of Minoris’s preferred [PostCSS](https://github.com/postcss/postcss) plugins wrapped up in a single, easy-to-use plugin.

## Installation

```bash
yarn add --dev postcss-minoris

# or, with npm

npm i postcss-minoris --save-dev
```

## Features

This plugin wraps around the following PostCSS transformations:

- [`postcss-calc`](https://github.com/postcss/postcss-calc)
- [`postcss-flexbugs-fixes`](https://github.com/luisrudge/postcss-flexbugs-fixes)
- [`postcss-selector-matches`](https://github.com/postcss/postcss-selector-matches)
- [`postcss-will-change`](https://github.com/postcss/postcss-will-change)
- [`autoprefixer`](https://github.com/postcss/autoprefixer)
- [`postcss-discard-comments`](https://github.com/ben-eb/postcss-discard-comments)

[npm-url]: https://npmjs.org/package/postcss-minoris
[npm-image]: http://img.shields.io/npm/v/postcss-minoris.svg?style=shield
